buildCommand: corepack enable && corepack prepare pnpm@9.15.0 --activate && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm -w -F @ai-vibe/web build
devCommand: corepack enable && corepack prepare pnpm@9.15.0 --activate && pnpm -C apps/web dev
installCommand: corepack enable && corepack prepare pnpm@9.15.0 --activate && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile --network-timeout 60000
